thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Murray Jardine
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Murray Jardine

author: Murray Jardine
title: Murray Jardine
text:
I have been using Omega Rental Cars for over twenty years, and usually renting on several occasions each year.
I would normally travel in excess of 10,000 Kms per year using Omega vehicles, and during that time I have never had a breakdown or safety issue with any vehicle they have supplied to me.
Omega Rental Cars are always well maintained and are always fitted with tyres that feature plenty of tread depth, which is very important when travelling New Zealand roads especially during the Winter months.
I have over the years, and will continue to recommend Omega Rental Cars to any of my friends that require rental cars in New Zealand.
My compliments go out to the wonderful Omega staff at Auckland Airport, Christchurch City and Airport as well as Queenstown.
The staff at these branches are the ones I usually have dealings with and they have always treated me like a good friend rather than just another customer, and that is very refreshing when you are already travel weary and looking forward to a smiling friendly face after a long tiring day.
